description: This file sets up a knowledge base using PDF URL data, configures an agent with an Azure-based model, and executes a query to generate a response about Thai curry.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that manages interactions with a language model and knowledge base.

classes.name: AzureAIFoundry
classes.description: A class representing an Azure-based AI model for the agent.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for vector database operations using PostgreSQL and pgvector.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
